Articles.Content:
After 18 tries and many crashes I finally did it. 2 days after .20 came out I deicded to try and land on mun and yes I finally did it. Unfortunatly they are stuck there now. Oh well but I did it

Photo
As far as i know , you can't really copy the link of facebook pictures and post them on other forums ._.
Ya wish I could though lol. I'll find another way.
You can right-click on the image itself to get the direct link. That'll show the picture itself irregardless of the settings you have it on.

I'd recommend Imgur for posting screenshots etc. Registration is free and all your uploaded images have the necessary forum codes ready to copy & paste.

Anyway,congratulations on your first landing on the Mun Still remember my first landing on the Mun,and it was quite nerve wrecking. But damn,the feeling you get when you landed successfully on another celestial body for the very first time can never be forgotten,even if it is just a game

You can right-click on the image itself to get the direct link. That'll show the picture itself irregardless of the settings you have it on.

So much for privacy. Dang it Facebook.
Use either Imgur puush or Dropbox for sharing screenshots.
And now... These poor Kerbals are stuck there... you are a bad Commander.

And now... These poor Kerbals are stuck there... you are a bad Commander.

Thats the only bad thing lol but yes I did land but did crash but the Capusle Survived so I considered it landed.
